speaker: char
text: Ahoy, matey! Sorry about the flies, they seem to follow me everywhere.

speaker: char
text: Just don’t mind them, I’m sure they won’t be too much of a bother.

speaker: char
text: What am I here for? I have a date, I can’t believe it. You have to make me as different as you can.

speaker: char
text: Nobody liked this old noggin’ so far, so I want you to make it different. Shave me, color me, the whole shebang!

speaker: char
text: Go all out, I really want to impress this gal. I have no experience with makeup so I completely trust you!
